You've been electrocuted!\""},{"lineNumber":181626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー……電撃はちょっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... electric shocks are a bit...\""},{"lineNumber":181627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What?\""},{"lineNumber":181628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん♪　はい♪　いえす♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes♪ Okay♪ Yes♪"},{"lineNumber":181629,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しげきてきですね♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's stimulating, isn't it? ♪\""},{"lineNumber":181630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「肩こり治る日和ですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this the perfect weather to cure stiff shoulders?"},{"lineNumber":181631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Right?\""},{"lineNumber":181632,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっきゃっ♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya kya♪"},{"lineNumber":181633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと電気ください♪　ください♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Give me more electricity♪ Please♪\""},{"lineNumber":181634,"originalJapaneseLine":"「バイランローズちゃんは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Byran Rose-chan,"},{"lineNumber":181635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感電すると何故かテンションが上がるの」","translatedEnglishLine":"somehow gets excited when electrocuted.\""},{"lineNumber":181636,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういうことは早く言えー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Say that kind of thing sooner!\""},{"lineNumber":181637,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いっしょにとけあいますぅ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall we melt together?\""},{"lineNumber":181638,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーーーーーー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaaaa♪\""},{"lineNumber":181639,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カチカチ♪　コチコチ♪","translatedEnglishLine":"Clack clack♪ Frozen solid♪"},{"lineNumber":181640,"originalJapaneseLine":"　氷さんが沢山降ってきます日ですか♪","translatedEnglishLine":"Is today a day when lots of ice falls? ♪\""},{"lineNumber":181641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心の臓がびっくりさんしてますか♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is your heart surprised? ♪\""},{"lineNumber":181642,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　氷攻撃はどうだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! How about an ice attack!\""},{"lineNumber":181643,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん♪　はい♪　いえす♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes♪ Okay♪ Yes♪"},{"lineNumber":181644,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よりどりみどりうれしいですね♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's so much to choose from, I'm happy ♪\""},{"lineNumber":181645,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……は……なう……♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... ha... now...♪\""},{"lineNumber":181646,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":181647,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれれれれーーーー？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ohhhhhh?\""},{"lineNumber":181648,"originalJapaneseLine":"　か、体さん、が、いやいやしてます？","translatedEnglishLine":"Is your b-body refusing?"},{"lineNumber":181649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うごけ、ない、びより？　あううう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can't move day? Auuuu?\""},{"lineNumber":181650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、なんだ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, what!?"},{"lineNumber":181651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　予想以上の効果が出てるぞ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's having more effect than expected!?\""},{"lineNumber":181652,"originalJapaneseLine":"「体が泥で構成されていると言ったの覚えてる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you remember I said your body is made of mud?"},{"lineNumber":181653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかしたら体内の水分が氷結して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe the moisture inside your body has frozen,"},{"lineNumber":181654,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本格的に動けなくなったんじゃないかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"and you've become completely immobile?"},{"lineNumber":181655,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん♪　はい♪　いえす♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes♪ Okay♪ Yes♪"},{"lineNumber":181656,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのとおりですね♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's exactly it♪\""},{"lineNumber":181657,"originalJapaneseLine":"「困ります？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you troubled?"},{"lineNumber":181658,"originalJapaneseLine":"　困るかもしれません♪","translatedEnglishLine":"You might be troubled♪"},{"lineNumber":181659,"originalJapaneseLine":"　困りますよー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are troubled♪\""},{"lineNumber":181660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、行動不能の内がちゃーんす！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, while she's immobilized is our chance!"},{"lineNumber":181661,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全員で叩いちまえー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone, beat her down!\""},{"lineNumber":181662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーーーーーーーーーん♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaaaaaan♪\""},{"lineNumber":181663,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やーーーーーーーーん♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yaaaaaan♪\""},{"lineNumber":181664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ど、どうだ？　倒せたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So, how is it? Did we defeat her?\""},{"lineNumber":181665,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん♪　はい♪　いえす♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes♪ Okay♪ Yes♪"},{"lineNumber":181666,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とってもつよいですね♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's very strong♪\""},{"lineNumber":181667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もっといっしょにとけあいたかったですよ♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wanted to melt together more♪\""},{"lineNumber":181668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃはっ♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaha♪\""},{"lineNumber":181669,"originalJapaneseLine":"泥姫バイランローズは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Mud Princess Byran Rose,"},{"lineNumber":181670,"originalJapaneseLine":"じわりじわりと地面に溶けて消えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"slowly melted into the ground and disappeared."},{"lineNumber":181671,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんともすごい感じの奴だったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She was quite an incredible one, wasn't she?\""},{"lineNumber":181672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「泥姫ちゃん、なむなむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mud Princess-chan, rest in peace...\""},{"lineNumber":181673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とっとと中に入るぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's get inside quickly.\""},{"lineNumber":181674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":181675,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、ケイブニャンさんと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Rance, Cave-nyan-san and"},{"lineNumber":181676,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シャリエラさんがいません」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shaliera-san are not here.\""},{"lineNumber":181677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？　逃げたのかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What? Did they run away?\""},{"lineNumber":181678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まあいい、また後で合流できるだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well, it's fine. We'll rendezvous with them later.\""},{"lineNumber":181679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は先に進むぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, let's move forward.\""},{"lineNumber":181680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh... yes...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いっしょにとけあいますぅ？」
ビリビリ♪　バリバリ♪
雷さん落っこちていい日でしたか♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was today a good day for thunder to fall? ♪"
"Is this the perfect weather to cure stiff shoulders?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと電気ください♪　ください♪」
感電すると何故かテンションが上がるの」
「そういうことは早く言えー！」
「いっしょにとけあいますぅ？」
氷さんが沢山降ってきます日ですか♪
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is today a day when lots of ice falls? ♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の臓がびっくりさんしてますか♪」
「がははは！　氷攻撃はどうだー！」
よりどりみどりうれしいですね♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's so much to choose from, I'm happy ♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: か、体さん、が、いやいやしてます？
うごけ、ない、びより？　あううう？」
予想以上の効果が出てるぞ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's having more effect than expected!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「体が泥で構成されていると言ったの覚えてる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you remember I said your body is made of mud?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかしたら体内の水分が氷結して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe the moisture inside your body has frozen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本格的に動けなくなったんじゃないかしら？」
「よーし、行動不能の内がちゃーんす！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, while she's immobilized is our chance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーーーーーーーーーん♪」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So, how is it? Did we defeat her?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とってもつよいですね♪」
「もっといっしょにとけあいたかったですよ♪」
泥姫バイランローズは、
じわりじわりと地面に溶けて消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: slowly melted into the ground and disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんともすごい感じの奴だったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was quite an incredible one, wasn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、ケイブニャンさんと
シャリエラさんがいません」
「……まあいい、また後で合流できるだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, it's fine. We'll rendezvous with them later."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いっしょにとけあいますぅ？」
ビリビリ♪　バリバリ♪
雷さん落っこちていい日でしたか♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was today a good day for thunder to fall? ♪"
"Is this the perfect weather to cure stiff shoulders?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと電気ください♪　ください♪」
感電すると何故かテンションが上がるの」
「そういうことは早く言えー！」

氷さんが沢山降ってきます日ですか♪
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is today a day when lots of ice falls? ♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心の臓がびっくりさんしてますか♪」

よりどりみどりうれしいですね♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's so much to choose from, I'm happy ♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: か、体さん、が、いやいやしてます？
うごけ、ない、びより？　あううう？」
予想以上の効果が出てるぞ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's having more effect than expected!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「体が泥で構成されていると言ったの覚えてる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you remember I said your body is made of mud?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかしたら体内の水分が氷結して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe the moisture inside your body has frozen,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本格的に動けなくなったんじゃないかしら？」
「よーし、行動不能の内がちゃーんす！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, while she's immobilized is our chance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーーーーーーーーーん♪」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So, how is it? Did we defeat her?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とってもつよいですね♪」
「もっといっしょにとけあいたかったですよ♪」
泥姫バイランローズは、
じわりじわりと地面に溶けて消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: slowly melted into the ground and disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんともすごい感じの奴だったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She was quite an incredible one, wasn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様、ケイブニャンさんと
シャリエラさんがいません」
「……まあいい、また後で合流できるだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, it's fine. We'll rendezvous with them later."
